meanings.definition: Ready to face and endure danger or pain; showing courage
meanings.sent1: The brave firefighter rescued the kitten from the tree.
meanings.sent2: She felt brave when she stood up to the bully at school.
meanings.sent3: The brave little squirrel tried to climb the giant elephant.
meanings.sent4: The brave knight fought off the dragon to save the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The brave soldier charged fearlessly into battle.

meanings.definition: To face or endure with courage
meanings.sent1: He will brave the storm to save his stranded friends.
meanings.sent2: They braved the haunted house together on Halloween night.
meanings.sent3: She decided to brave the spicy food challenge at the fair.
meanings.sent4: The explorer braved the harsh conditions of the Arctic to reach the North Pole.
meanings.sent5: The hiker braved the steep mountain trail to enjoy the breathtaking view at the top.
